mapper.select: SELECT mr.`name`, CASE WHEN mr.max < 20 THEN '小' WHEN mr.max >=20 AND mr.max < 50 THEN '中' ELSE '大' END AS scale, mr.max, m.date, DATE_FORMAT(m.start,'%H:%i') AS `start`, DATE_FORMAT(m.end,'%H:%i') AS `end`, m.title, JSON_LENGTH(m.members) AS num, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT d.dept_name separator "，" ) FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_dept d ON u.dept_id=d.id WHERE u.`status`=1 AND JSON_CONTAINS ( m.members, CAST( u.id AS CHAR ) ) ) AS dept, ( SELECT CONCAT( "[", GROUP_CONCAT( JSON_OBJECT ( "name", u.name, "photo", u.photo ) SEPARATOR "," ), "]" ) FROM tb_user u WHERE u.`status`=1 AND JSON_CONTAINS ( m.members, CONVERT ( u.id, CHAR ) ) ) AS members, ( SELECT CONCAT( "[", GROUP_CONCAT( JSON_OBJECT ( "title", m.title, "start", DATE_FORMAT(m.`start`,'%H:%i'), "end", DATE_FORMAT(m.`end`,'%H:%i') ) SEPARATOR "," ), "]" ) FROM tb_meeting_room mr JOIN tb_meeting m ON mr.`name` = m.place WHERE mr.id =#{meetingRoomId} AND mr.`status` = 1 AND m.date=CURRENT_DATE() ) AS meetings FROM tb_meeting_room mr LEFT JOIN tb_meeting m ON mr.`name`=m.place AND CURRENT_DATE()=m.date AND CURRENT_TIME() BETWEEN m.`start` AND m.`end` WHERE mr.id=#{meetingRoomId} AND mr.`status`=1
